name: Bodyguard (Cloud_Pixel)
description:
I've created this game to fill a gap so you people aren't left without content, it's has a catch the crab a like gameplay, but instead of crabs, you have to save the president from ninjas that are trying to kill him with your sniper rifle, or don't you got to pick and choose.

It has 3 little endings, can you find them all?
